text: The AP Interview: Harris says Trump can't be spared accountability for Jan. 6  —  U.S. Vice President Kamala Harris sat down with Associated Press reporter Chris Megerian in Jakarta, Indonesia on Wednesday.  She spoke about democracy and accountability regarding the January 6 Capitol riot.  —  Videos
